Breaking news notifications are among the most important channels by which we receive information. LibreNews aims to democratize this medium by providing a minimalist, free, open source, fast, secure, and decentralized news notification service that will run on almost any phone.
LibreNews provides ad-free, decentralized, and secure breaking news notifications.

You\'ll mostly interact with LibreNews through its notifications, as the app itself is just settings. \n\nYou\'ll probably get around 3 breaking news notifications per day, if you stick with the default settings.
LibreNews doesn\'t track you in any way, and doesn\'t have ads. It\'s completely open source, making the code free for anyone to see.
